Body:
"""Helper for checking basic DataFrame attributes."""
self.assertListEqual(list(df.columns), saw_14.SPECIFIC_FIELD_LIST_COLUMNS)
self.assertTrue((df.dtypes == np.dtype('O')).all())
self.assertTrue(df[saw_14.SPECIFIC_FIELD_LIST_COLUMNS[0]].
    is_monotonic_increasing)
self.assertTrue(df.index[0] == 0)
self.assertTrue(df.index.is_monotonic_increasing)
